mapper.select: SELECT S.EQM_ID as EQM_ID, S.LOG_TM as LOG_TM, S.TEMP_NOW as TEMP_NOW FROM EQM_ST_NOW S LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS P ON(S.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS_NOW PN ON(P.PRCS_ID = PN.PRCS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS_ST PS ON(PN.PRCS_NOW_ID = PS.PRCS_NOW_ID) WHERE PS.ST = 'STATE1'

SELECT S.EQM_ID, S.LOG_TM, S.PROD_QY FROM EQM_ST_NOW S LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS P ON(S.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS_NOW PN ON(P.PRCS_ID = PN.PRCS_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS_ST PS ON(PN.PRCS_NOW_ID = PS.PRCS_NOW_ID) WHERE PS.ST = 'STATE1'
